TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TcpClient extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 提供 TCP 網路服務的用戶端連接。

span.span: Provides client connections for TCP network services.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別提供簡單的方法來連線，傳送，並接收透過同步封鎖模式中的網路進行串流處理資料。The class provides simple methods for connecting, sending, and receiving stream data over a network in synchronous blocking mode. 為了讓連接並交換資料，或是建立 TCP必須接聽內送連接要求。In order for to connect and exchange data, a or created with the TCP must be listening for incoming connection requests. 您可以連接至此接聽程式在下列兩種方式之一：You can connect to this listener in one of the following two ways: - 建立並呼叫其中一個可用的三個方法。Create a and call one of the three available methods. - 建立使用主機名稱和連接埠號碼的遠端主機。Create a using the host name and port number of the remote host. 這個建構函式將會自動嘗試連線。This constructor will automatically attempt a connection. > [!NOTE] > 如果您想要將無連接的資料包傳送同步封鎖模式中，使用類別。If you want to send connectionless datagrams in synchronous blocking mode, use the class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立連接。The following code example establishes a connection. [!code-cpp[System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient/CPP/tcpclient.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient/CS/tcpclient.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient/VB/tcpclient.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式會建立新並將它繫結所指定`localEP`參數。This constructor creates a new and binds it to the specified by the `localEP` parameter. 在呼叫這個建構函式之前，您必須建立使用您想要傳送和接收資料的 IP 位址和連接埠號碼。Before you call this constructor, you must create an using the IP address and port number from which you intend to send and receive data. 您不需要指定連接和通訊之前的本機 IP 位址和連接埠號碼。You do not need to specify a local IP address and port number before connecting and communicating. 如果您建立使用任何其他建構函式，基礎的服務提供者會指派最適當的本機 IP 位址和連接埠號碼。If you create a using any other constructor, the underlying service provider will assign the most appropriate local IP address and port number. 您必須呼叫方法，然後再傳送和接收資料。You must call the method before sending and receiving data. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立的執行個體類別使用的本機端點。The following code example demonstrates how to create an instance of the class using a local endpoint. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式會建立新並使同步連線嘗試提供的主機名稱和連接埠號碼。This constructor creates a new and makes a synchronous connection attempt to the provided host name and port number. 基礎的服務提供者會指派最適當的本機 IP 位址和連接埠號碼。The underlying service provider will assign the most appropriate local IP address and port number. 將會封鎖直到連接或失敗為止。 will block until it either connects or fails. 這個建構函式可讓您來初始化、 解析 DNS 主機名稱，以及連接在一個方便存取的步驟。This constructor allows you to initialize, resolve the DNS host name, and connect in one convenient step. 如果已啟用 IPv6 和呼叫方法來連線到主機解析為這兩個 IPv6 和 IPv4 位址、 IPv6 位址將會連接嘗試之前的 IPv4 位址的第一個。If IPv6 is enabled and the method is called to connect to a host that resolves to both IPv6 and IPv4 addresses, the connection to the IPv6 address will be attempted first before the IPv4 address. 這可能會有延遲的時間來建立連接，如果主機並未接聽 IPv6 位址的效果。This may have the effect of delaying the time to establish the connection if the host is not listening on the IPv6 address. > [!NOTE] > 如果您收到，使用來取得特定的錯誤碼。If you receive a , use to obtain the specific error code. 取得此程式碼之後，您可以參考[Windows Sockets 第 2 版 API 錯誤碼](/windows/desktop/winsock/windows-sockets-error-codes-2)錯誤的詳細描述的文件。After you have obtained this code, you can refer to the [Windows Sockets version 2 API error code](/windows/desktop/winsock/windows-sockets-error-codes-2) documentation for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立的執行個體類別使用的主機名稱和連接埠號碼。The following code example demonstrates how to create an instance of the class using a host name and port number. [!code-cpp[ClassicTcpClient.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ClassicTcpClient.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample/CPP/source.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[ClassicTcpClient.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ClassicTcpClient.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample/CS/source.cs#3)] [!code-vb[ClassicTcpClient.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ClassicTcpClient.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample/VB/source.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別衍生自可以使用這個屬性來判斷是否已成功連線嘗試。Classes deriving from can use this property to determine if a connection attempt has succeeded. 它不會監視進行中的連接狀態。It does not monitor the ongoing connection state of . 如果遠端主機會關閉連線，將不會更新。If the remote host closes the connection, will not be updated. 如果您衍生自，而且需要更加留意的連接狀態時，使用屬性所傳回方法。If you are deriving from and require closer attention to the connection state, use the property of the returned by the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一個方式來判斷資料是否已排入佇列進行讀取。 is a way to determine whether data is queued for reading. 如果資料可供使用，呼叫取得的資料。If data is available, call to get the data. 可用的資料是總資料量已排入佇列進行讀取的網路緩衝區中。The available data is the total amount of data queued in the network buffer for reading. 如果沒有資料會排入佇列中的網路緩衝區中，會傳回 0。If no data is queued in the network buffer, returns 0. 如果遠端主機關機或關閉連接，可能會擲回。If the remote host shuts down or closes the connection, may throw a . 如果您收到，使用來取得特定的錯誤碼。If you receive a , use to obtain the specific error code. 取得此程式碼之後，您可以參考 Windows Sockets 第 2 版 API 錯誤碼文件位於 MSDN library， [ http://msdn.microsoft.com/library ](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library)如需詳細的錯誤描述。After you have obtained this code, you can refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library) for a detailed description of the error. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用屬性。The following code example shows the use of the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 非同步作業必須完成呼叫方法。The asynchronous operation must be completed by calling the method. 一般而言，會叫用方法`asyncCallback`委派。Typically, the method is invoked by the `asyncCallback` delegate. 這個方法不會封鎖直到作業完成為止。This method does not block until the operation completes. 若要封鎖直到作業完成為止，使用其中一種方法多載。To block until the operation completes, use one of the method overloads. 如需使用非同步程式設計模型的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)。For detailed information about using the asynchronous programming model, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立並連接至遠端主機。The following code example creates a and connects to a remote host. remarks.format: ## Remarks 非同步作業必須完成呼叫方法。The asynchronous operation must be completed by calling the method. 一般而言，會叫用方法`asyncCallback`委派。Typically, the method is invoked by the `asyncCallback` delegate. 這個方法不會封鎖直到作業完成為止。This method does not block until the operation completes. 若要封鎖直到作業完成為止，使用其中一種方法多載。To block until the operation completes, use one of the method overloads. 如需使用非同步程式設計模型的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)。For detailed information about using the asynchronous programming model, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立並連接至遠端主機。The following code example creates a and connects to a remote host. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法將標示為已處置的執行個體，並要求相關聯關閉 TCP 連線。The method marks the instance as disposed and requests that the associated close the TCP connection. 根據屬性，TCP 連線可能會保持開啟一陣子之後，仍會傳送資料時，會呼叫方法。Based on the property, the TCP connection may stay open for some time after the method is called when data remains to be sent. 沒有基礎連接已完成關閉時提供通知。There is no notification provided when the underlying connection has completed closing. 呼叫這個方法最後會關閉相關聯也會關閉相關聯用來傳送和接收資料，若已建立。Calling this method will eventually result in the close of the associated and will also close the associated that is used to send and receive data if one was created. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範右藉由呼叫方法。The following code example demonstrates closing a by calling the method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性取得的連接狀態截至最後一個 I/O 作業的通訊端。The property gets the connection state of the socket as of the last I/O operation. 當它傳回`false`，則通訊端永遠不會連接，或已中斷連線。When it returns `false`, the socket was either never connected, or is no longer connected. 因為屬性只會反映最新的作業連接的狀態，您應該嘗試傳送或接收訊息，以判斷目前的狀態。Because the property only reflects the state of the connection as of the most recent operation, you should attempt to send or receive a message to determine the current state. 這個屬性的訊息傳送失敗之後，不會再傳回`true`。After the message send fails, this property no longer returns `true`. 請注意，此行為是經過設計。Note that this behavior is by design. 您無法可靠地測試連接的狀態，因為在測試與傳送/接收之間的時間，連接可能已遺失。You cannot reliably test the state of the connection because, in the time between the test and a send/receive, the connection could have been lost. 通訊端連線，並小心處理傳輸失敗，則應該假設您的程式碼。Your code should assume the socket is connected, and gracefully handle failed transmissions. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會連線到遠端端點，然後驗證該連接。The following code example connects to a remote endpoint and then verifies the connection. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法覆寫 。This method overrides . 應用程式程式碼不應該呼叫這個方法。物件的方法會自動叫用記憶體回收期間，除非呼叫已停用記憶體回收行程的最終處理方法。Application code should not call this method; an object's method is automatically invoked during garbage collection, unless finalization by the garbage collector has been disabled by a call to the method. 類別完成項關閉 TCP 連接，並與相關聯的 managed 的資源全部釋出。The class finalizer closes the TCP connection and releases all managed resources associated with the . 這些資源包括基礎用來與遠端主機、 連接和用來傳送和接收資料。These resources include the underlying used for connecting with the remote host, and the used to send and receive data. 完成項並不會釋放任何 unmanaged 的資源。The finalizer does not release any unmanaged resources. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [Finalize 方法和解構函式](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/0s71x931(v%3dvs.100))，[清除 Unmanaged 資源總](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)，並[覆寫 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Finalize Methods and Destructors](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/0s71x931(v%3dvs.100)), [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md), and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).

A`true`值表示資料的遠端主機已收到，且可供讀取。A `true` value means that data has arrived from the remote host and is available for reading. 在此情況下，一定會立即完成。In this case, is guaranteed to complete immediately. 如果遠端主機已關閉其連線，會立即傳回零個位元組。If the remote host has shutdown its connection, will immediately return with zero bytes. > [!NOTE] > 您必須先關閉時透過傳送和接收資料。You must close the when you are through sending and receiving data. 關閉不會釋放。Closing does not release the . > [!NOTE] > 如果您收到，使用來取得特定的錯誤碼。If you receive a , use to obtain the specific error code. 取得此程式碼之後，您可以參考[Windows Sockets 第 2 版 API 錯誤碼](/windows/desktop/winsock/windows-sockets-error-codes-2)錯誤的詳細描述的文件。After you have obtained this code, you can refer to the [Windows Sockets version 2 API error code](/windows/desktop/winsock/windows-sockets-error-codes-2) documentation for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用以取得基礎。The following code example uses to obtain the underlying . 取得之後，傳送與接收使用其和方法。After obtaining the , it sends and receives using its and methods. remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性變更的方式方法的行為。The property changes the way method behaves. 這個屬性時設定修改用以連接可以重設的 Winsock 的條件。This property when set modifies the conditions under which the connection can be reset by Winsock. 連接重設，仍然會根據 IP 通訊協定行為。Connection resets can still occur based on the IP protocol behavior. 此屬性控制的 TCP 連線會維持開啟狀態之後呼叫的時間長度資料保持傳送。This property controls the length of time that the TCP connection will remain open after a call to when data remains to be sent. 當您呼叫方法中，資料會放在傳出的網路緩衝區中。When you call the method, data is placed in the outgoing network buffer. 這個屬性可以用來確保這項資料會傳送到遠端主機，才能進行方法會卸除連接。This property can be used to ensure that this data is sent to the remote host before the method drops the connection. 若要啟用延遲，請建立執行個體包含所需的值，並設定，這個執行個體的屬性。To enable lingering, create a instance containing the desired values, and set the property to this instance. 下表描述的行為方法的可能值屬性並屬性儲存在屬性。The following table describes the behavior of the method for the possible values of the property and the property stored in the property. |LingerState.EnabledLingerState.Enabled|LingerState.LingerTimeLingerState.LingerTime|行為Behavior| |-------------------------|----------------------------|--------------| |`false` （已停用），預設值`false` (disabled), the default value|逾時並不適用，（預設值）。The time-out is not applicable, (default).|嘗試將預設 IP 通訊協定等候逾時到期之前傳送暫止資料。Attempts to send pending data until the default IP protocol time-out expires.| |`true` （已啟用）`true` (enabled)|非零的逾時A nonzero time-out|嘗試傳送暫止資料，直到指定的逾時到期，但如果嘗試失敗，然後 Winsock 重設連接。Attempts to send pending data until the specified time-out expires, and if the attempt fails, then Winsock resets the connection.| |`true` （已啟用）`true` (enabled)|零逾時。A zero timeout.|會捨棄任何暫止的資料和 Winsock 重設連接。Discards any pending data and Winsock resets the connection.| IP 堆疊預設 IP 通訊協定逾時期限，將會根據計算的連線的來回時間。The IP stack computes the default IP protocol time-out period to use based on the round trip time of the connection. 在大部分情況下，堆疊所計算的逾時則是更為相關應用程式所定義的其中一個項目。In most cases, the time-out computed by the stack is more relevant than one defined by an application. 這是通訊端的預設行為時屬性未設定。This is the default behavior for a socket when the property is not set. 當屬性會儲存在屬性設定為大於預設 IP 通訊協定等候逾時，預設 IP 通訊協定等候逾時仍會在套用，並覆寫。When the property stored in the property is set greater than the default IP protocol time-out, the default IP protocol time-out will still apply and override. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定並取得通訊端的延遲時間。The following code example sets and gets the sockets linger time. remarks.format: ## Remarks 當已`false`、不會傳送封包透過網路之前就已收集了大量的傳出的資料。When is `false`, a does not send a packet over the network until it has collected a significant amount of outgoing data. 因為在 TCP 區段的負擔量，而傳送少量資料沒有效率。Because of the amount of overhead in a TCP segment, sending small amounts of data is inefficient. 不過，並存在的情況下，您要傳送的資料量很少或預期來自您所傳送的每個封包的立即回應。However, situations do exist where you need to send very small amounts of data or expect immediate responses from each packet you send. 您應該衡量網路效率和應用程式需求的相對重要性。Your decision should weigh the relative importance of network efficiency versus application requirements. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會停用延遲。The following code example disables the delay. 接著它會檢查值若要確認已成功設定的屬性。It then checks the value of to verify that the property was successfully set. remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會取得或設定您預期接收緩衝區中儲存以供每個讀取作業的位元組數目。The property gets or sets the number of bytes that you are expecting to store in the receive buffer for each read operation. 此屬性實際上則會配置用來接收內送資料的網路緩衝區空間操作。This property actually manipulates the network buffer space allocated for receiving incoming data. 您的網路緩衝區應該至少與您的應用程式緩衝區，以確保，當您呼叫的所需的資料都是可用一樣大方法。Your network buffer should be at least as large as your application buffer to ensure that the desired data will be available when you call the method. 使用屬性來設定這個大小。Use the property to set this size. 如果您的應用程式將會接收大量資料，您應該傳遞方法非常大的應用程式的緩衝區。If your application will be receiving bulk data, you should pass the method a very large application buffer. 如果網路緩衝區的資料量小於您要求在方法，將無法擷取所需的一個讀取作業中的資料量。If the network buffer is smaller than the amount of data you request in the method, you will not be able to retrieve the desired amount of data in one read operation. 這會造成其他呼叫的額外負荷方法。This incurs the overhead of additional calls to the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設定，並取得接收緩衝區的大小。The following code example sets and gets the receive buffer size. remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會取得或設定必須要有在每次呼叫中傳送的位元組數目方法。The property gets or sets the number of bytes that you are expecting to send in each call to the method. 此屬性實際上會管理傳送作業所配置的網路緩衝區空間。This property actually manipulates the network buffer space allocated for send operation. 您的網路緩衝區應該至少與您的應用程式緩衝區，以確保所需的資料會儲存，並在單一作業中傳送一樣大。Your network buffer should be at least as large as your application buffer to ensure that the desired data will be stored and sent in one operation. 使用屬性來設定這個大小。Use the property to set this size. 如果您的應用程式將用來傳送大量資料，您應該傳遞方法非常大的應用程式的緩衝區。If your application will be sending bulk data, you should pass the method a very large application buffer. 如果您的網路緩衝區的資料量小於您提供方法，由數個網路的傳送您對每個呼叫將會執行作業方法。If the network buffer is smaller than the amount of data you provide the method, several network send operations will be performed for every call you make to the method. 您可以確保您的網路緩衝區至少與您的應用程式緩衝區一樣大，以達到更高的資料輸送量。You can achieve greater data throughput by ensuring that your network buffer is at least as large as your application buffer. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設定，並取得傳送緩衝區大小。The following code example sets and gets the send buffer size.
